entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 19. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h overnight. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 02 January 2023
